trans-unit.source: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un servizio che fornisce proprietà ed eventi per controllare la visualizzazione e il comportamento delle descrizioni comandi.

trans-unit.source: You define a tooltip for an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile definire una descrizione comando per un elemento impostando la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip property takes one child.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ToolTip richiede un elemento figlio.

trans-unit.source: The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that has embedded text and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> elements.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto dell'elemento figlio può variare da una stringa di testo al contenuto più complesso, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>che incorpora il testo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can define tooltip content as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: È possibile definire il contenuto della descrizione comandi come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>oggetto, ma questo non è necessario.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you do not define the tooltip content as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, you can use the ToolTipService properties to position and customize the tooltip content.
trans-unit.target: Quando non si definisce la descrizione comando contenuta come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>dell'oggetto, è possibile utilizzare le proprietà di ToolTipService per posizionare e personalizzare il contenuto della descrizione comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTipService class attached properties are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà della classe associata ToolTipService vengono utilizzate per determinare il posizionamento, comportamento e l'aspetto di una descrizione comando.

trans-unit.source: These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà vengono impostate sull'elemento che definisce la descrizione comandi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class and the ToolTipService class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>classe e la classe ToolTipService condividono molte delle stesse proprietà che consentono di personalizzare una descrizione comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: If equivalent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and ToolTipService properties are both set, the ToolTipService property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se sono equivalenti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>e ToolTipService sono entrambe impostate, la proprietà ToolTipService ha la precedenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: For example, if both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName> object, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is used.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se entrambi il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>vengono impostate proprietà per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto, il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene utilizzata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following ToolTipService timing properties are only defined for the ToolTipService class and are used by all tooltips: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A> For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields.
trans-unit.target: Le seguenti proprietà temporali ToolTipService vengono definite solo per la classe ToolTipService e vengono utilizzate da tutte le descrizioni comandi:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A>per informazioni su come gestire gli eventi che si verificano quando la descrizione comando apre o chiude, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>campi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A> behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A>si comportano in modo analogo alle proprietà con lo stesso nome di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> in ascolto su questo evento.

trans-unit.target: Il gestore dell'evento da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto a cui viene scritta la proprietà associata.

trans-unit.target: Il valore da impostare.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*> attached property for an object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*>proprietà per un oggetto associata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: If the value is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> is used without any modification.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>oggetto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>viene utilizzato senza alcuna modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: If the value is any other type, that value is used as the content for a tooltip that is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è qualsiasi altro tipo, tale valore viene utilizzato come il contenuto per una descrizione comando che viene fornita da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>

trans-unit.source: The object to which the attached property is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto a cui viene scritta la proprietà associata.

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da impostare.

trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*>proprietà per un oggetto associata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: The object to which the attached property is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto a cui viene scritta la proprietà associata.

trans-unit.source: The desired value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore desiderato.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration*>proprietà associata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowOnDisabled*>proprietà associata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowOnDisabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> event that is exposed by objects that use the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref> service to display tooltips.
trans-unit.target: Identifica il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>evento esposto da oggetti che utilizzano il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"> </xref> servizio per visualizzare le descrizioni comandi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> event occurs immediately before a tooltip closes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>evento si verifica immediatamente prima della chiusura di una descrizione comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.source: This field registers the behavior of the ToolTipClosingEvent event for classes that use this service.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo Registra il comportamento dell'evento ToolTipClosingEvent per le classi che utilizzano questo servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>entrambe le classi implementano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>ed esporre l'evento attraverso il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] funzioni di accesso <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the tooltip as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> event is also raised when the tooltip closes.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica la descrizione comando come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>oggetto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>evento viene generato anche quando la descrizione comando viene chiusa.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event that is exposed by objects that use the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref> service to display tooltips.
trans-unit.target: Identifica il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>evento esposto da oggetti che utilizzano il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"> </xref> servizio per visualizzare le descrizioni comandi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>evento si verifica immediatamente prima che verrà visualizzata una descrizione comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento si verifica se la descrizione comando non è definita o se il contenuto della descrizione comando viene impostato su null.

trans-unit.source: This field registers the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event for classes that use this service.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo Registra il comportamento del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>eventi per le classi che utilizzano questo servizio.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>entrambe le classi implementano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>ed esporre l'evento attraverso il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] funzioni di accesso <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the tooltip as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> event is also raised when the tooltip opens.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica la descrizione comando come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>oggetto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>evento viene generato anche quando viene visualizzata la descrizione comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*>proprietà associata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*>proprietà associata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
